Package org.elasticsearch.rest

Exposes Elasticsearch functionality over RESTful HTTP.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RestChannel
    A channel used to construct bytes / builder based outputs, and send responses.
    RestFilterChain
    A filter chain allowing to continue and process the rest request.
    RestHandler
    Handler for REST requests
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractRestChannel  
    BaseRestHandler
    Base handler for REST requests.
    BytesRestResponse  
    DeprecationRestHandler
    DeprecationRestHandler provides a proxy for any existing RestHandler so that usage of the handler can be logged using the DeprecationLogger.
    RestController  
    RestFilter
    A filter allowing to filter rest operations.
    RestRequest  
    RestResponse  
    RestUtils  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RestRequest.Method  
    RestStatus  

Package org.elasticsearch.rest Description

Exposes Elasticsearch functionality over RESTful HTTP.
